comments.body: Were they not signed prior to issac?

no, v0.10.1 was the first signed stable, signed with `6C481CF6`, I don't believe there was anyone else that should be in the list but we can amend if we discover otherwise (I haven't look through _all_ of the releases tbh)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +413,417 @@* Julien Gilli <jgilli@fastmail.fm> `114F43EE0176B71C7BC219DD50A3051F888C628D`
* Timothy J Fontaine <tjfontaine@gmail.com> `7937DFD2AB06298B2293C3187D33FF9D0246406D`
